description: Main Flutter application entry point defining a simple app with a scaffold and progress indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter app, setting theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home page with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage, builds the UI with a scaffold and progress indicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and MyHomePage.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage.
